generator.description: Tool that generated this 3D Tiles model.  Useful for debugging.

generatorVersion.description: The version of the tool that generated this 3D Tiles model.  Useful for debugging.

version.description: The 3D Tiles version. The version defines the JSON schema for the tileset JSON and the base set of tile formats.

tilesetVersion.description: Application-specific version of this tileset, e.g., for when an existing tileset is updated.
